problems.title: Allocate Single Integer
problems.description: Allocate memory for a single integer, assign a value, print it, and deallocate properly.
problems.inputFormat: Single integer n

problems.title: Dynamic Array Allocation
problems.description: Allocate a dynamic array, fill it with values, print it, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Sum of Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array dynamically, calculate sum, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Find Maximum in Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array dynamically, find maximum, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Reverse Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array, reverse it in-place, print, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Copy Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate two arrays, copy first to second, print second, deallocate both.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Even Numbers
problems.description: Allocate array dynamically, count even numbers, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Search in Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array, search for element, return index, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
Third line: target element

problems.title: Increment All Elements
problems.description: Allocate array, increment all elements by 1, print, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Merge Two Dynamic Arrays
problems.description: Allocate two arrays and a result array, merge them, print result, deallocate all.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (size of array 1)
Second line: n integers
Third line: m (size of array 2)
Fourth line: m integers

problems.title: Average of Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array, calculate average, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Positive Numbers
problems.description: Allocate array, count positive numbers, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Find Minimum in Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array, find minimum element, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Remove Duplicates
problems.description: Allocate array, create new array with unique elements, print, deallocate both.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Double Array Size
problems.description: Allocate array, create new array with double size, copy elements, deallocate old, print new, deallocate new.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print new array (old elements + n zeros), space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: Array size doubled, new elements are 0

problems.title: Swap First and Last
problems.description: Allocate array, swap first and last elements, print, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Product of Array Elements
problems.description: Allocate array, calculate product of all elements, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Check Sorted Array
problems.description: Allocate array, check if sorted in ascending order, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Fill Array with Value
problems.description: Allocate array of size n, fill with value v, print, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: v (value to fill)
problems.outputFormat: Print array filled with v, space-separated

problems.title: Second Largest Element
problems.description: Allocate array, find second largest element, and deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
